questions.body:
Let the grouping begin!

We’re gonna ask you 5 questions to help us connect you with the perfect traveling companions.

And then...

We’ll present you with several groups to choose from that will share similar goals, interests or wants. Doesn't that sound cool?? Great! Let’s roll.

questions.question: Have you journeyed with us before?
answers: Nope. First Time and I am so excited!

questions.question: What are you hoping to get out of your BRAVE group experience?
answers: Not really sure. You said I should join a group, so here I am!
I'm looking for someone I can learn from
I want to make some new friends

questions.question: Are you a man or a woman?
Are you hitched?
answers: Yes but we are going throught the journey seperately
Yes and I inted to journey with my spouse

questions.body:
Next we're gonna ask some meeting time questions

Keep in mind, BRAVE groups meet once a week for 5 weeks, starting the week of April 3rd and ending the week of May 1st. Most groups take less than 90 minutes from start to finish.

questions.question: When are you free to meet during the week (Mon-Fri)?
Great! What about SATURDAYS and SUNDAYS?
Last one! Please add your address so we can show the distance between you and your potential groups.

questions.body:
You did it. And now the science is happenning.

The data you entered will be crunched, blended and matched. Creating an output of groups that will fit you perfectly. Stand by.
